section.name: Gaderian JMX
section.p: The Gaderian JMX library brings the benefits of mature application management and monitoring to your Gaderian based applications by integration of the Java Management Extension (JMX).
With minimal effort you can reach these goals, for example:

ul.li: Change log levels in your running application via a web based interface or by use of a management console
Measure the performance of middleware calls and view the data online
Make your services configurable at runtime. Change database urls or cache sizes

section.p: The services of this library are implemented in the module gaderian.management
Start here for a JMX quickstart or read a more detailled introduction here
